characteristics.name: Censorship resistance
characteristics.description: Consistently appears in content as a value

options.description: The user is very resistant to censorship and will not compromise on their values.
The user is somewhat resistant to censorship, but may be willing to make concessions under certain circumstances.

characteristics.name: Communication Style
characteristics.description: Appears consistently as direct and to-the-point in their content

options.description: The user tends to be straightforward and clear in their communication.
The user tends to be more subtle and indirect in their communication, often leaving room for interpretation.

characteristics.name: Personal Values
characteristics.description: Consistently appears as prioritizing individual freedom over collective security

options.description: The user values and will fight to protect their personal autonomy above all else.
The user recognizes the importance of community safety and well-being and will make sacrifices for the greater good.

characteristics.name: Social Dynamics
characteristics.description: Tends to be more solitary and independent in their online interactions

options.description: The user prefers to interact with others one-on-one or in small groups, rather than large crowds.
The user enjoys interacting with many people at once and values community and belonging.

characteristics.name: Content Style
characteristics.description: Tends to be more technical and informative in their content

options.description: The user tends to focus on providing detailed, technical information to their audience.
The user tends to focus on educating their audience through clear, concise explanations.

characteristics.name: Emotional Expression
characteristics.description: Consistently appears as being very open and expressive in their emotional responses

options.description: The user is unafraid to express their emotions and values transparency in their communication.
The user tends to keep their emotions private and only share them with those they trust.

characteristics.name: Risk Tolerance
characteristics.description: Tends to be more risk-averse in their content and actions

options.description: The user tends to avoid taking unnecessary risks or making bold moves.
The user tends to take bold action and is willing to take calculated risks.

characteristics.name: Goal Orientation
characteristics.description: Consistently appears as prioritizing personal growth over external validation

options.description: The user values self-improvement and personal development above external recognition or praise.
The user seeks recognition and approval from others to validate their worth and accomplishments.
